languages.text: "Когда Ваша Светлость вступилась за малые культы, они получили возможность заниматься вербовкой более открыто, и ряды их пополнились даже глупцами, которые пока не ведают, что участвуют в заговоре выродков".

"When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."
languages.original_text: "Когда Ваша Светлость вступилась за малые культы, они получили возможность заниматься вербовкой более открыто, и ряды их пополнились даже глупцами, которые пока не ведают, что участвуют в заговоре выродков".

traits.locale_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} has stood up for the minor cults, they have been able to recruit more openly and their ranks are now filled with the fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in the conspiracy of the degenerates."

"When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."

languages.text: “当您为那些小型教派挺身而出时，他们得到了珍贵的机会，借着这个机会招募新的教徒，壮大他们的行列。如今，他们的行列中充斥着各种各样的蠢人，那些人根本不知道他们被卷入了异端分子的阴谋之中。”
languages.original_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: “当您为那些小型教派挺身而出时，他们得到了珍贵的机会，借着这个机会招募新的教徒，壮大他们的行列。如今，他们的行列中充斥着各种各样的蠢人，那些人根本不知道他们被卷入了异端分子的阴谋之中。”
“当您为那些小型教派挺身而出时，他们得到了珍贵的机会，借着这个机会招募新的教徒，壮大他们的行列。如今，他们的行列中充斥着各种各样的蠢人，那些人根本不知道他们被卷入了异端分子的阴谋之中。”

languages.text: «Cuando defendisteis a los cultos menores, estos recibieron una oportunidad de oro para reclutar más abiertamente a sus filas, que ahora están llenas de necios que aún no se han dado cuenta de que participan en una conspiración herética».
languages.original_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando defendisteis a los cultos menores, estos recibieron una oportunidad de oro para reclutar más abiertamente a sus filas, que ahora están llenas de necios que aún no se han dado cuenta de que participan en una conspiración herética».

languages.text: 「陛下が少数派魔女団のために立ち上がったとき、奴らはより公然と自分たちの仲間を募る絶好の機会を獲得しました。それに応えた愚か者は、自分たちが異端の陰謀に加担していることにまだ気づいていないのです」
languages.original_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下が少数派魔女団のために立ち上がったとき、奴らはより公然と自分たちの仲間を募る絶好の機会を獲得しました。それに応えた愚か者は、自分たちが異端の陰謀に加担していることにまだ気づいていないのです」
「陛下が少数派魔女団のために立ち上がったとき、奴らはより公然と自分たちの仲間を募る絶好の機会を獲得しました。それに応えた愚か者は、自分たちが異端の陰謀に加担していることにまだ気づいていないのです」

languages.text: « Quand Votre Seigneurie a pris la défense des cultes mineurs, cela leur a donné l'occasion de recruter plus de fidèles dans leurs rangs, désormais truffés d'imbéciles qui n'ont pas encore réalisé qu'ils font partie d'une conspiration hérétique. »
languages.original_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: « Quand Votre Seigneurie a pris la défense des cultes mineurs, cela leur a donné l'occasion de recruter plus de fidèles dans leurs rangs, désormais truffés d'imbéciles qui n'ont pas encore réalisé qu'ils font partie d'une conspiration hérétique. »

languages.text: "Als Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} sich für die kleineren Kulte eingesetzt hat, war das für sie eine goldene Gelegenheit, unverhohlen um neue Mitglieder zu werben. Nun haben sie unzählige neue Rekruten — Narren, denen noch nicht klar ist, dass sie Teil einer ketzerischen Verschwörung sind."
languages.original_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: "Als Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} sich für die kleineren Kulte eingesetzt hat, war das für sie eine goldene Gelegenheit, unverhohlen um neue Mitglieder zu werben. Nun haben sie unzählige neue Rekruten — Narren, denen noch nicht klar ist, dass sie Teil einer ketzerischen Verschwörung sind."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, ufak çaplı tarikatları desteklediğinde onlar da saflarına yeni üyeler katmayı açıkça sürdürebilecekleri altın bir fırsat yakaladılar. Safları şimdilerde kâfirce bir komploda yer aldığının henüz farkına varamayan ahmaklarla dolu."
languages.original_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} stood up for the minor cults, they received a golden opportunity to recruit more openly to their ranks, which are now brimming with fools who have yet to realise that they are partaking in a heretical conspiracy."
